I did user reasearch and analysis to come up with a design that would work well for both new and experienced users who were at various stages of learning about social analytics.

Evil Genius

I worked at Top Hat as a Software Developer. Top Hat is a 10-person startup that makes educational software. During my time there, I worked on two projects. First, I created a browser-based testing suite using Selenium. As my second task, I created a web-based CRM tool that kept track of sales leads from creation through sale. As with any startup, I was constantly contributing to bug fixes, manual testing and any other issues that popped up.

I participated in multiple global database go-lives that critically impacted the production process. I led a team of individuals to complete testing and validate the new database system during go-live. I was exposed to fundamental project management principles in accordance with Project Management Institute (PMI) standards. I also successfully completed the PMI Certified Associate in Project Management (CAPM) course and exam.
